item.description: MCP Containerized Development Guide üü¢ Active ‚Ü©Ô∏è Back to Documentation Index Overview This guide explains how to use the containerized development environment for the Multi-Agent Control Platform (MCP). Containerization ensures consistent behavior across different development machines and production environments.
